mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (name, description, access_code, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{accessCode}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, access_code = #{accessCode}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT board_id AS boardId, name, description, access_code AS accessCode, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM board WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
SELECT board_id AS boardId, name, description, access_code AS accessCode, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM board ORDER BY board_id
